sentences.en: A minute is the sixtieth part of an hour.
sentences.cn: 一分钟是一小时的六十分之一.

sentences.en: A minute is the sixtieth part of hour.
sentences.cn: 一分钟是一小时的六十分之一。

sentences.en: First, thanks for your coming for our sixtieth graduation ceremony of our school.
sentences.cn: 首先感谢各位长官与嘉宾拨空前来参加本校第六十届的毕业典礼.

sentences.en: For China and North Korea's ( DPRK ) sixtieth anniversary, China got another nuclear test.
sentences.cn: 但是在中国和朝鲜六十年建国纪念时, 中国却得到了另一次核试验.

sentences.en: He died in his sixtieth year, ie at the age of 59.
sentences.cn: 他在步入六十岁时去世(即实足年龄59岁).

sentences.en: He died in his sixtieth year.
He is to retire on his sixtieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 他准备在60岁生日那天退休。

sentences.en: I would like to propose a toast to Mr. Smith on his sixtieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生六十大寿,我提议举杯敬他.

sentences.en: On your sixtieth anniversary, you are supposed to give a diamond.
sentences.cn: 在你的六十周年纪念上面, 你应该得到一颗钻石.

sentences.en: The camera has a shutter speed of one - sixtieth of a second.
sentences.cn: 这架照像机的快门速度达六十分之一秒.

sentences.en: Today is the sixtieth anniversary of our country's independence.
sentences.cn: 今天是我国独立六十周年纪念日.

words.tran_cn: 第十六的；十六分之一的
（与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一
六十年代；六十多岁；六十到七十之间

trans.tran_cn: 第六十的；六十分之一的
